lead_paragraph: Including last week’s triumph at the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am, Phil Mickelson, who is tied for the lead at the Nissan Open with Padraig Harrington,  has run into little interference of late.
snippet: Including last week’s triumph at the Pebble Beach National Pro-Am, Phil Mickelson, who is tied for the lead at the Nissan Open with Padraig Harrington,  has run into little interference of late.
